mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture(title, content, path, date, position, begin_time, end_time, capacity) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{path}, #{date}, #{position}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{capacity})
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, path = #{path}, date = #{date}, position = #{position}, begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, capacity = #{capacity} WHERE id = #{id}
